tool.name: TOCFuzzificationTool

param.name: input_raster
param.dialogReference: This is the evidence raster that has been symbolized to represent the fuzzy membership.

param.name: classes
param.dialogReference: Enter the total number of classes in the symbolized input rasters. This is an integer value.

tool.summary: This fuzzification method utilized the symbolization of the input raster that has been applied in the map document table of contects (TOC). The symbolization in the TOC defines the number of classes and this tool rescales those classes (1...N) to the range [0,1] by (C - 1)/(N-1) where C is the class value and N is the number of classes.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This fuzzification method utilized the symbolization of the input raster that has been applied in the map document table of contects (TOC). The symbolization in the TOC defines the number of classes and this tool rescales those classes (1...N) to the range [0,1] by (C - 1)/(N-1) where C is the class value and N is the number of classes.
